title: Bug 114470 [Smoke] Error message is displayed when using new Date('3/2/2005') as a value in table filter
description: When attempting to filter a table with the value new Date('3/2/2005'), an error occurs.
OB: An error message is displayed when attempting to filter a table with the value new Date('3/2/2005').
EB: Save and preview the table. Expected result: The filter should work without errors. Actual result: An error message is displayed on the report page, indicating that there are errors in Table8. The error message reads: 'table8Error0: data.engine.DataConversionError (1 time(s)) - An error occurred in data type conversion. It cannot convert it to Date.'
SR:
To reproduce the bug, follow these steps:
1. Open the application.
2. Navigate to the table filter feature.
3. Enter the value 'new Date('3/2/2005')' in the filter.
4. Attempt to save and preview the table.
